title: Heartbreaking last text to mother revealed from woman who fell into volcano
description: A young woman who died after plunging into a volcano in Indonesia had sent a heartbreaking text to her mother at the start of her trip in South East Asia.
content:

description: Climate change is driving "some of the most widespread and damaging drought events in recorded history," according to a report published Wednesday on global drought hotspots.Over the past two years, droughts have fueled increased food insecurity, dehydration,…
